COVID-19 vaccination for all people 5 years and older, includin g people who are pregnant, 
breastfeeding, trying to get pregnant now, or might become pregnant in the future. Evidence about the safety and 
effectiveness of COVID-19 vaccination during pregnancy has been growing. Research data suggest that the benefits of 
receiving a COVID-19 vaccine outweigh any known or potential risks of vaccination during pregnancy.
